TopicTitle: Top Game (A Top Gear Parody) - Reliant Robin Plane Challenge !

Articles.Content:
Here is Episode 9 of Top Gear in Game (That hasn't been suspended!) This is the Top Gear parody in game! Tonight, we attempt to fly a Reliant Robin, take an Enzo round our track and even have a Little 'TG Live News!' All in this little parody of Top Gear!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/PL1soZfclW0?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Thanks for reading, if you have any points I could improve on be sure to let me know! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

-TheBlockRoom

It's a successful version of my attempt ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
